title: Rock Candy Funk Party - Groove is King (2015) [FLAC]
description:
Awesome Jazz-Rock-Funk Fusion from a high class cooperative featuring Joe Bonamassa, Tal Bergman, Ron DeJesus & Mike Merrit - and a special guest: Billy Gibbons (ZZ Top) as Mr. Funkadamus!


Rock Candy Funk Party - Groove Is King
Label: J&R Adventures
Format: CD, Album
Country: US
Released: July 31, 2015
Genre: Funk, Jazz, Rock, Fusion


01. Introducing the Master of Ceremonies Mr. Funkadamus [0:30]
02. Groove is King [3:28]
03. Low Tide [2:49]
04. Uber Station [5:04]
05. East Village [6:55]
06. If Six Was Eight [4:44]
07. Cube's Brick [7:33]
08. And Now a Word from Our Fine Sponsors With Mr. Funkadamus [0:18]
09. Don't Be Stingy with the SMPTE [5:16]
10. C You on the Flip Side [5:08]
11. Digging in the Dirt [6:20]
12. Don't Funk With Me [5:56]
13. The 6 Train to the Bronx [6:10]
14. Rock Candy [5:27]
15. Mr. Funkadamus Thanks All the Senors But Especially the Senoritas [0:28]
16. The Fabulous Tales of Two Bands [5:40] 



Personnel:

Joe Bonamassa (guitar)
Ron DeJesus (guitar)
Renato Neto (keyboards)
Mike Merritt (bass)
Tal Bergman (drums)

Randy Brecker (trumpet)
Ada Rovatti (saxes)
James Campagnola (baritone sax)

Mr. Funkademus a.k.a. Billy Gibbons - voice
